body:
Comment 11: 
@minux.ma As per comment #9, I assumed it was clear that the issue wasn't fixed by the
latest changes.

Can you please tell me what I did wrong? I tried to comment on the revision itself but
didn't proceed because the interface seemed to only allow comments on specific lines of
code, while I wanted to state that the issue wasn't fixed by the whole change (so I did
it here).
